block.p: American League TEXAS RANGERS--Assigned OF Jason McDonald to Oklahoma of the PCL from Charlotte of the Florida State League. Transferred RHP Clint Sodowsky from Tulsa of the Texas League to Oklahoma.

National League HOUSTON ASTROS--Placed RHP Shane Reynolds and 2B Craig Biggio on the 15-day disabled list. Called up RHP Brian Powell from New Orleans of the PCL. FLORIDA MARLINS--Sent INF Mendy Lopez to Calgary of the PCL. LOS ANGELES DODGERS--Activated OF F.P. Santangelo from the 15-disabled list. Placed INF Chris Donnels on the 15-day disabled list. MILWAUKEE BREWERS--Placed RHP David Weathers on the 15-day disabled list. Recalled LHP Rafael Roque from Indianapolis of the International League. Purchased the contract of RHP Everett Stull from Indianapolis. Designated RHP Bob Scanlan for assignment.

National Basketball Association HOUSTON ROCKETS--Signed G Cuttino Mobley to a six-year contract. INDIANA PACERS--Re-signed F Jalen Rose. MILWAUKEE BUCKS--Waived F Danny Manning. ORLANDO MAGIC--Named Ted Arzonico trainer. SAN ANTONIO SPURS--Re-signed F Tim Duncan. Signed G Raja Bell. SEATTLE SUPERSONICS--Signed F Rashard Lewis to a three-year contract. UTAH JAZZ--Signed G John Starks to a two-year contract.
Women's National Basketball Association WASHINGTON MYSTICS--Placed C Heather Owen on the injured list. Activated C Michelle Campbell from the injured list.

National Football League DETROIT LIONS--Agreed to terms with DE Robert Porcher on a one-year contract. INDIANAPOLIS COLTS--Placed DT Rob Renes on the injured reserve list. NEW ORLEANS SAINTS--Signed OT Jay Hawgood and FB Brian Milne. Released DE Troy Wilson and WR Anthony Rodgers. SEATTLE SEAHAWKS--Signed WR Ben Clampitt. Claimed RB Robert Farmer off waivers from the New York Jets.

National Hockey League BOSTON BRUINS--Re-signed F Shawn Bates, F Andre Savage, F Mikko Eloranta, F Cameron Mann, F Eric Nickulas and D Elias Abrahamsson to one-year contracts. COLORADO AVALANCHE--Signed F Mike Craig, F Dan Hinote, F Ville Nieminen, D Dan Smith, D Brian White and G Frederic Cassivi. COLUMBUS BLUE JACKETS--Named Ross Yates assistant coach of Syracuse of the AHL. WASHINGTON CAPITALS--Signed D Rob Zettler to a one-year contract.

BDELAWARE--Named Christine Koren women's assistant basketball coach. HAVERFORD--Promoted assistant baseball coach Dave Beccaria to baseball coach. Named Ed Molush pitching coach, Eric Day assistant athletic trainer, Leanne Cole multicultural recruiting-administrative intern and Charles Baltimore and Wana Saadzoi women's assistant basketball coaches. HOBART--Named Ed Stephenson men's IONA--Named Kara Brennan senior women's administrator. KANSAS STATE--Named Nicole Green assistant director of compliance. LONG ISLAND U.-SOUTHAMPTON--Named Jim Meyer women's basketball coach. PRINCETON--Named Michael Cross associate director of athletics and Jim McLaughlin assistant director of athletics. PROVIDENCE--Named Margot Royer women's volleyball coach. RHODE ISLAND COLLEGE--Named Nicole Follett women's gymnastics coach. ST. JOHN'S, N.Y.--Named Diane Torres and Craig Vesci assistant athletic trainers. ST. PETER'S--Announced the resignation of Kim Culligan, associate director of athletics and senior woman administrator, to take a similar position at Kean. SOUTHERN ILLINOIS--Announced the retirement of Julie Beck, women's basketball coach, effective Aug. 31. Named Lori Opp women's basketball coach. SOUTHERN METHODIST--Named Chris Johnson director of basketball operations. SOUTHERN MISSISSIPPI--Named Beth Leaver women's assistant soccer coach. TEXAS--Named Cleve Bryant to associate athletics director for football operations. UTAH--Named Ryan Forsyth assistant ski coach for alpine events. VIRGINIA--Named Jason Dunn men's and women's asistant cross country coach.
